text:
FrankSchooley
April 15, 1957
Dr. Burton Paulu
Station KOOK
University of Minnesota
Ilinnespolis ll;, Minnesota
Dear Burt:
Wonder if you night not try to got, for KAEB Annual Convention,
greeting from Eisenhower similar to that extended to UMITB Con¬
vention. I light be possible this year in view of his recent re¬
marks favoring ET7 and educational broadcasting.
imagine Leonard Harks, Frank Schooley, etc. could suggest how
to approach for this.
Sincerely,
HJS/bek
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
